trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class exposes a public <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event.
You can use the properties of the QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs class to return custom help for a particular control to an accessible client, such as a screen reader.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs 类的属性返回到可以访问客户端，如屏幕阅读器的特定控件的自定义帮助。

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event, you must set the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A> properties to appropriate values.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp>事件中，你必须设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A>为适当的值的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryAccessibilityHelp>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A> property should be a string representation of a numeric Help topic ID.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>属性应为的字符串表示形式数值的帮助主题 id。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs.HelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs"></xref> class.
The file containing Help for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
The string defining what Help to get for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定义什么帮助以获取字符串<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The keyword to associate with the Help request for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 帮助请求关联的关键字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Help keyword for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定控件的帮助关键字。

trans-unit.source: The Help topic associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that was queried.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的帮助主题<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>的查询。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定的帮助文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Help file.
This name can be in the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.
trans-unit.target: 此名称可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm 的形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string defining what Help to get for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置定义何种帮助获取字符串<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Help to retrieve for the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的辅助性对象的帮助。
